channel.title: Uncutweb beta 4 released
channel.description:
Site Link: http://www.uncutweb.com Version: beta 4
Credits: Me and Onlyonerule (of course :P)
[code=php]Uncutweb beta 4.0 released Uncutweb beta 4 introduces a remade forum layout. Which makes it easier to see the newest post in any topic. New Features:
- Date system - New professional forum layouts - New Register page - Forums now order by the last post posted in (Thanks to Onlyonerule)
So Don't wait... Register for Beta 4 today![/code] http://www.uncutweb.com/forums/topic/1/1/Uncutweb-4.0-released.html
What do you guys think of my progress. What does the site need? What does it have too much of? Etc...
PS. It is completely tableless except for the members and register page.

item.title: Uncutweb beta 4 released

item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

Site Link: http://www.uncutweb.com
Version: beta 4

Credits: Me and Onlyonerule (of course :P)

[code=php]Uncutweb beta 4.0 released
Uncutweb beta 4 introduces a remade forum layout. Which makes it easier to see the newest post in any topic.
New Features:

  • Date system
  • New professional forum layouts
  • New Register page
  • Forums now order by the last post posted in (Thanks to Onlyonerule)

So Don’t wait… Register for Beta 4 today![/code]
http://www.uncutweb.com/forums/topic/1/1/Uncutweb-4.0-released.html

What do you guys think of my progress. What does the site need? What does it have too much of? Etc…

PS. It is completely tableless except for the members and register page.
